description: Eden AI is a platform that provides a range of AI services, including text generation, summarization, translation, and more.

actions.name: detect_language
actions.description: Detect the language used in a text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers and models.

actions.name: extract_entities
actions.description: Identify entities (names, places) in text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

actions.name: extract_keywords
actions.description: Identify important terms in a text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

actions.name: generate_text
actions.description: Generate text completions using various AI providers through Eden AI chat endpoint.

actions.name: image_generation
actions.description: Create images from text prompts using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, models, and resolutions.

actions.name: invoice_parser
actions.description: Extract structured invoice data from files using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and document types.

actions.name: moderate_text
actions.description: Detect explicit or policy-violating text using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

actions.name: ocr_image
actions.description: Extract text from images (OCR) using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and bounding box coordinates.

actions.name: receipt_parser
actions.description: Extract structured data from receipts and documents using Eden AI. Supports general data extraction with bounding boxes.

actions.name: spell_check
actions.description: Identify and correct spelling or grammar errors using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.

actions.name: summarize_text
actions.description: Extract key sentences and create summaries from long text passages using various AI providers.

actions.name: text_to_speech
actions.description: Convert text to spoken audio using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and voice customization.

actions.name: translate_text
actions.description: Translate text into different languages using Eden AI. Supports multiple providers, languages, and models.
